txt.en: 'I notice a strange light of many colours coming from the far end of this ancient city's edge, [placeholder]. What could it be? Will you go and take a look? I worry there is some goblin camp-fire perched near us, and the goblins are ready to spring!'

'What do you have there, [placeholder]? Ah! Were these fair crystals the source of the light I saw, and not a goblin-fire? That is wonderful! We can harvest those crystals for lamps in these desolate parts.'
Öndótt noticed a strange light coming from a far end of the Old Silvertine City, and wants you to find its source.
Find the source of the light ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
The strange light came from the far end of the Old Silvertine City from where Öndótt stands.\n\nYou should find the source of the strange light.
Öndótt is at the top of the stair in the Old Silvertine City.\n\nYou should return to Öndótt with the crystals you gathered.
